onboarding.step1.phone.title: Step 1: Phone Verification
onboarding.step1.phone.subtitle: Country prefix auto populates. Enter area code & phone number. Voice, message & data rates may apply. Code expires in 5 minutes.
onboarding.step1.phone.title1: Please provide the phone number that you would like to add to your account. We will need to verify this number and will do so by sending you a verification code by SMS or voice message. This enables us to confirm your identity and secure your account from fraud.
onboarding.step1.phone.verification.titl: Please enter the verification code we sent to the phone number you provided
onboarding.setp2.email.message: We have sent a verification link to your email. Please check your inbox and click on the verification link.If you didn't see one, check your spam/junk folders.
